title.narrative: IDEA - stöd till Sudan´s transition till demokrati

description.narrative: Projektets övergripande mål är att stödja den demokratiska övergången i Sudan genom att upprätta mekanismer för dialog och konsensusuppbyggnad med fokus på delstatsnivå; stärka kapaciteten för NEC (National Election Committee) att leverera rättvisa och fredliga val; öka kvinnors deltagande och representation i politiska processer; samt stärka medborgarnas kunskap om politiska processer och demokratiska styrning. Det förväntas att Sudans övergångsperiod och processer som initierats av transitionsregeringen kan leda till demokrati, men är i behov av kapasitetsstärkande åtgärder. Projektet är ett komplement till EU´s insats för att stärka demokrati i Sudan och som genomförs av International IDEA. Det är emellertid två fristående program. Programmet sträcker sig över tre år (2020-2023) och budgeten är 45,3 MSEK

The overall objective is to support the democratic transition of Sudan by supporting the establishment of mechanisms for dialogue and consensus-building on the transition processes; strengthen the capacity of NEC (National Election Committee) deliver credible and peaceful elections; enhance women participation and representation in political processes, and strengthen citizens awareness on the transitional processes and the broader democratic governance practices. It is anticipated that Sudan’s transition period and processes will provide an opportunity for the country’s transition to democracy. The contribution is a complement to EU´s project for strengthening democracy in Sudan and is implemented by International IDEA. The project is complementary to the EU´s contribution to strengthening the democracy in Sudan and is implemented by IDEA. However, they are two independent projects. The duration of the project is 2020-2023, and the total budget is 45,3 MSEK.

The overall purpose of the contribution is to support Sudan’s transition to a democratic system and prepare for the coming election at the end of the transition period. It contributes to SDG 16 to promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels and SDG target 5: Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life. The objectives with the contribution are to contribute to the following: • Improved citizens awareness on the transitional processes and democratic governance.• Policymakers within political parties and the government apply increased knowledge and skills to make more informed choices regarding democracy reforms• The National Election Commission apply increased knowledge and skills to recognize and respond to complexities and risks in the electoral processes and effectively implement the Electoral Cycle Approach• Civil society (with a focus on women’s groups) and media in Sudan apply increased knowledge and skills to engage with constitution-makers, policymakers in political parties and government and the National Election Commission democratically and effectively and promote broad public participation in the process
